price: 52. Dheh: Bal ka warrama hadduu ka yimid (Qur’aanka) xagga Alle, markaas aad ku gaalowdaan - yaa ka lunsanaan badan kan ku sugan gaalnimo iyo khilaaf fog.
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ كَفَرۡتُم بِهِۦ مَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِمَّنۡ هُوَ فِي شِقَاقِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in kāna min ʿindi al-lahi thumma kafartum bihi man aḍallu mimman huwa fī shiqāqin baʿīdin
